name: JuiceBlocks
description:
### JuiceBlocks ###

Tap fruits to change them. Get four matching fruits in a square to create and clear a Juice Block!

Get as many points as you can in 100 moves.

Playable on Mac only

Game developed in Unity 5, by Liam Chessell, for #1GAM May 2016

Art created in Photoshop, Sounds created in bfxr.net

Background music is "Crystal" by Vibe Tracks on the Youtube Creative Suite
